text: Humoresque is a 1946 American romantic drama movie directed by Jean Negulesco and is the second adaption of the 1919 short story of the same name by Fannie Hurst. It stars Joan Crawford, John Garfield, Oscar Levant, Joan Chandler, Peggy Knudsen, Paul Cavanagh and was distributed by Warner Bros.. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1947. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1946 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Jean Negulesco
title: Humoresque (movie)
